name: Alien Trucker Star
description:
Story

Being an overnight watch guard of a monster truck arena was never your first choice for a job, but after 5 months of relentless job searching, you've become pretty desperate. So anyway, you're just minding your business watching over the monster trucks, when out of nowhere, a swarm of green aliens inside spaceships come down from the night sky to destroy all of the trucks with their Mega bullets! You're armed with nothing but a bat to protect the trucks with, so good luck to you.

Basic FAQ

Is this my first game? - No. If you've known me for a long time, then you would know.

What did you use to make this? - Clickteam Fusion 2.5.

What inspired you to make this? - My inspirations for making this were Flappy Bird, and another endless runner created by the same person called Shuriken Block.

Did you draw all of the graphics yourself - Yes. I received no help with the graphics whatsoever.

Who plays the voice of Jimbo? - The voice of Jimbo is played by my dad, who kindly agreed to help me out.

Will we ever get to see Jimbo's ma? - I'll never tell... ):)

If any of you have any other questions that you would like to ask me either about this game or future projects, please leave them down in the comment section, and I'll do my best to answer them probably through a devlog.
